name: Skyclaw Thrash
originalText: Whenever Skyclaw Thrash attacks, flip a coin. If you win the flip, Skyclaw Thrash gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: If you lose the flip, nothing happens. Skyclaw Thrash continues to attack as normal.
